title: Junior Software Engineer (Python/React) - On-site, Pune
description:
**Company Description** 




 At Turtle Software Pvt. Ltd., we're not just building software; we're building the future for India's Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprises (MSMEs). Our mission is to engineer a paradigm shift in the business software domain by leveraging the power of Artificial Intelligence. We create intelligent, intuitive, and impactful products that empower millions of businesses to optimize their operations, drive growth, and thrive in a competitive landscape. Backed by Google Cloud for Startups and proud build partners with Google.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 We are seeking a motivated Junior Software Engineer (Python/React) for a full\\-time, on\\-site role at our Pune office. The responsibilities for this role include developing, testing, and deploying features for our AI\\-powered SaaS platform. The engineer will work on front\\-end (React) and back\\-end (Python) development, collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to integrate features seamlessly, and address technical challenges. Additional tasks involve maintaining code quality, debugging, and contributing to continuous improvements in functionality and efficiency within an agile development environment.
 



  





**Qualifications** 



* Strong foundation in Computer Science principles, including algorithms, data structures, and problem\\-solving techniques.
* Experience in Back\\-End Web Development and Software Development using frameworks and technologies like Python and React.
* Strong debugging and troubleshooting skills with attention to detail and best coding practices.
* Familiarity with agile methodologies and a collaborative mindset to work effectively in a team environment.
* Bachelor’s/Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field is required.
* Experience with cloud platforms such as Google Cloud or knowledge of SaaS applications is an added advantage.

title: Software Engineer
description:
At Lilly, we unite caring with discovery to make life better for people around the world. We are a global healthcare leader headquartered in Indianapolis, Indiana. Our employees around the world work to discover and bring life\\-changing medicines to those who need them, improve the understanding and management of disease, and give back to our communities through philanthropy and volunteerism. We give our best effort to our work, and we put people first. We’re looking for people who are determined to make life better for people around the world.
   

  

**Software Engineer**
**About The Technology Organization**
 Technology at Lilly builds and maintains capabilities using pioneering technologies like most prominent tech companies. What differentiates Technology at Lilly is that we create new possibilities through tech to advance our purpose – creating medicines that make life better for people around the world, like data driven drug discovery and connected clinical trials. We hire the best technology professionals from a variety of backgrounds, so they can bring an assortment of knowledge, skills, and diverse thinking to deliver solutions in every area of our business.
   

  

**About The Business Function**
 The Software Product Engineering (SPE) team is a specialised engineering group that delivers strategic solutions and differentiated capabilities. We take a forward\\-thinking approach, focusing on an enterprise platform and product mindset, ensuring that the solutions we build can be leveraged across Technology teams for broader impact and efficiency.
   

  

**Job Title: Software Engineer**
**Role Summary**
 As a Software Engineer, you will develop and maintain user\\-friendly, responsive, and accessible web interfaces using React and related technologies. You will collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to deliver high\\-quality solutions that enhance user experience and support business objectives.
   

  

**What You’ll Be Doing**
* Develop and maintain user\\-friendly frontend components using React and related libraries.
* Build responsive and accessible user interfaces, ensuring a great experience for all users.
* Collaborate with backend engineers to integrate APIs and deliver seamless features.
* Participate in code reviews and contribute ideas to improve our engineering practices.
* Analyse and debug software to enhance performance and maintainability.
* Work closely with product, design, and engineering teams to deliver high\\-quality solutions.
* Embrace opportunities to learn new technologies and tools as part of your growth.


**How You Will Succeed**
* Apply modern frontend workflows and build tools (e.g., Webpack, Babel, ESLint).
* Integrate with backend services via RESTful APIs.
* Demonstrate strong communication and collaboration skills.
* Participate in code reviews and continuous improvement.


**What You Should Bring**
* 2–4 years of hands\\-on experience building web applications with React (or similar frameworks).
* Good understanding of JavaScript (ES6\\+), HTML5, and CSS3\\.
* Exposure to state management tools (e.g., Redux, Context API) is a plus.
* Familiarity with accessibility and performance optimisation best practices.
* Experience integrating with backend services via RESTful APIs.
* Exposure to version control (Git) and basic CI/CD concepts.
* Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent practical experience).
* Demonstrated curiosity, enthusiasm, and willingness to learn new technologies.


**Basic Qualifications And Experience Requirement**
* 2–4 years of hands\\-on experience building web applications.
* Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent practical experience).


**Additional Skills/Preferences**
* Experience with TypeScript, Material\\-UI, or other component libraries.
* Exposure to cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) or containerisation (Docker) is a plus.
* Experience with unit testing frameworks (e.g., Jest, React Testing Library).
* Interest in contributing to open\\-source projects or tech communities.
* Understanding of Agile methodologies and software development lifecycle (SDLC).
* Experience in regulated industries (e.g., Life Sciences) is a bonus but not required.


 Lilly is dedicated to helping individuals with disabilities to actively engage in the workforce, ensuring equal opportunities when vying for positions. If you require accommodation to submit a resume for a position at Lilly, please complete the accommodation request form (https://careers.lilly.com/us/en/workplace\\-accommodation) for further assistance. Please note this is for individuals to request an accommodation as part of the application process and any other correspondence will not receive a response.
   

  

 Lilly does not discriminate on the basis of age, race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, national origin, protected veteran status, disability or any other legally protected status.
   

  

 \\#WeAreLilly

 Remote

 3 Months

**About Webs IT Solution** 




 Webs IT Solution is a technology and innovation organization offering hands\\-on training and project\\-based internships in software development, web technologies, AI, data, and cybersecurity. The company focuses on bridging the gap between academic learning and industry requirements through live projects and expert mentorship.
 



**Role Overview** 




 As a Web Developer Intern, you will work on designing, developing, and maintaining dynamic websites and web applications. This internship is ideal for students or graduates who are passionate about coding, UI design, and building responsive web solutions from concept to deployment.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 



* Develop and maintain responsive websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks such as React.js, Bootstrap, or Tailwind CSS
* Work with backend technologies such as Node.js, Django, or PHP for full\\-stack development
* Collaborate with designers to create clean, user\\-friendly web interfaces
* Integrate APIs and manage efficient client–server communication
* Optimize websites for performance, speed, and SEO best practices
* Debug and resolve technical issues to ensure a smooth user experience



**Requirements** 



* Currently pursuing or completed a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, IT, or related fields
* Proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript with basic knowledge of frontend frameworks
* Familiarity with backend technologies such as Node.js, Python (Flask/Django), or PHP
* Understanding of databases like MySQL or MongoDB and Git version control
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and creativity in design implementation



**What You Will Gain** 



* Certificate of Internship
* Hands\\-on experience working on real\\-world web projects with live deployment
* Mentorship from experienced developers and designers
* Opportunity to build a strong, professional web development portfolio
* Networking and placement assistance post\\-internship
* Potential full\\-time role based on performance

title: Deep Learning Engineer
description:
**About The Job**
**Mercor** 
 connects elite creative and technical talent with leading AI research labs. Headquartered in San Francisco, our investors include
 **Benchmark** 
 ,
 **General Catalyst** 
 ,
 **Peter Thiel** 
 ,
 **Adam D'Angelo** 
 ,
 **Larry Summers** 
 , and
 **Jack Dorsey** 
 .
   

  

**Position:** 
 Machine Learning Engineer
   

  

**Type:** 
**Contract**
**Compensation:** 
**$14/hour**
**Location:** 
**Remote**
**Role Responsibilities**
* Design and implement scalable ML pipelines for model training, evaluation, and continuous improvement.
* Build and fine\\-tune deep learning models for reasoning, code generation, and real\\-world decision\\-making.
* Collaborate with data scientists to collect and preprocess training data, ensuring quality and representativeness.
* Develop benchmarking tools that test models across reasoning, accuracy, and speed dimensions.
* Implement reinforcement learning loops and self\\-improvement mechanisms for agent training.
* Work with systems engineers to optimize inference speed, memory efficiency, and hardware utilization.


**Qualifications**
**Must\\-Have**
* Strong background in machine learning, deep learning, or reinforcement learning.
* Proficiency in Python and familiarity with frameworks such as PyTorch, TensorFlow, or JAX.
* Understanding of training infrastructure, including distributed training, GPUs/TPUs, and data pipeline optimization.
* Experience with MLOps tools (e.g., Weights \\& Biases, MLflow, Docker, Kubernetes, or Airflow).
* Experience designing custom architectures or adapting LLMs, diffusion models, or transformer\\-based systems.


**Preferred**
* Curiosity about AI agents and how models can simulate human\\-like reasoning, problem\\-solving, and collaboration.


**Compensation \\& Legal**
* Weekly Bonus of $500 \\- $1000 per 5 tasks created.


**Application Process (Takes 20–30 mins to complete)**
* Upload resume
* AI interview based on your resume
* Submit form


**Resources \\& Support**
* For details about the interview process and platform information, please check: https://talent.docs.mercor.com/welcome/welcome
* For any help or support, reach out to: support@mercor.com


*PS: Our team reviews applications daily. Please complete your AI interview and application steps to be considered for this opportunity.*

title: R&D Specialists
description:
Job Description
 



 Role: Research, Development \\& Testing Executive (Full\\-Time Internship)
 



 Stipend: ₹10,000 / month
 



 Duration: Full\\-time Internship
 



 Eligibility: 4th Year Graduation Students
 



 Experience: Previous Internship Experience Required
 



 Work Mode: Hybrid (Work\\-from\\-Office Focused)
 



  





 About the Role
 



 We are looking for a highly motivated Research, Development \\& Testing Executive Intern who can work closely with cross\\-functional teams including Tech, Product, HR, Customer Success, and Management. This role focuses on market research, execution, automation, project coordination, and testing, ensuring high\\-quality product delivery and client success.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities
 



 1\\. Research \\& Execution Responsibilities
 



 Collect customer feedback from the Customer Success Team and ensure alignment between the Tech Team and Project Manager for quick updates and improvements.
 



 Conduct weekly market and internal surveys to identify feature improvements, modifications, and new feature opportunities.
 



 Document and assist in the initial execution of Beta Projects and newly launched services.
 



 Research market opportunities and provide data\\-driven decision\\-making insights using CRM tools and analytical platforms.
 



 Collaborate with the HR Team to identify gaps in team coordination, welfare, and productivity.
 



 Introduce tools, automations, and sheet setups aimed at improving overall team productivity.
 



 Perform market research on assigned topics and present structured, data\\-backed analysis to team heads.
 



  





 2\\. Development \\& Execution Responsibilities
 



 Work as an Assistant Project Manager with Raghav, coordinating between the Tech Team and Clients to ensure successful project delivery.
 



 Focus on client success, ensuring the final product aligns with client needs and expectations.
 



 Identify opportunities to automate internal processes to increase efficiency and productivity.
 



 Assist in achieving R\\&D and Tech Team productivity goals.
 



 Create and manage client\\-facing documentation, videos, and workbooks.
 



  





 3\\. Testing \\& Quality Assurance Responsibilities
 



 Create User Testing Cases and develop documentation and automation workflows to improve testing productivity.
 



 Set up and manage Unit Tests, Widget Tests, and Hybrid Testing Environments before production releases.
 



 Take responsibility for production readiness of features and services going live.
 



 Work closely with development teams to ensure bug\\-free applications and quality benchmarks.
 



 Create, maintain, and improve Data Audits and Testing Audits on a daily or weekly basis as required.
 



 Develop and continuously improve a seamless testing process to meet quality and performance goals.
 



  





 Required Skills \\& Qualifications
 



 Currently in 4th year of graduation 
 



 Prior internship experience is mandatory.
 



 Strong analytical and research skills with a data\\-driven mindset.
 



 Basic understanding of software development, testing, and project coordination.
 



 Familiarity with CRM tools, documentation tools, spreadsheets, and automation tools.
 



 Good communication and coordination skills.
 



 Ability to work in a fast\\-paced, execution\\-focused environment.
 



  





 What You’ll Gain
 



 Hands\\-on experience across Research, Development, Testing, and Project Management.
 



 Exposure to real\\-world product launches and client handling.
 



 Opportunity to work closely with leadership and tech teams.
 



 Strong foundation for careers in Product, Project Management, QA, or R\\&D roles.
 



 Internship is to be converted into a full\\-time employment role based on performance.

title: Java Developer - Director - Software Engineering - Morgan Stanley
description:
**Java Developer \\- Director \\- Software Engineering**
 We're seeking someone to join our Institutional Securities Technology team as a Java developer, in Prime Brokerage Tech to , involved in Design \\& Development of real\\-time platform that requires fast calculations
   

  

 In the Technology division, we leverage innovation to build the connections and capabilities that power our Firm, enabling our clients and colleagues to redefine markets and shape the future of our communities.
   

  

 This is Director position that manages and optimizes the technical environment and end\\-user experience across various workplace technologies for end\\-users, ensuring seamless operations and user satisfaction across the organization.
   

  

 Since 1935, Morgan Stanley is known as a global leader in financial services, always evolving and innovating to better serve our clients and our communities in more than 40 countries around the world.
   

  

**What you'll do in the role:**
* We're seeking someone to join our team as (Director) Java Developer involved in Design \\& Development of real\\-time platform that requires fast calculations, efficient memory management and a highly scalable architecture.
* This role provides an exciting opportunity to motivated candidates to work in a fast\\-paced environment on varied projects from short term tactical enhancements to strategic initiatives that impact multiple firm systems and business groups.
* Candidates will design and develop using latest technology architectures \\& API model. Candidates will be involved in all phases of SDLC such as requirements gathering, designing, developing, testing and supporting the application in production.
* Candidates will also be involved with ongoing technology support for the business users and queries.


**What you'll bring to the role:**
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Software, or related field of study.
* 5 \\- 7 Years of development in Java (Spring)
* Proficient in developing multi\\-threaded applications using Core Java, Spring
* Excellent problem solving skills \\& good communication skills
* Good knowledge of OO, data structures \\& algorithms
* Good understanding of RDBMS, Basic SQL, Data Analysis
* Working experience with Unix operating system
* Good to have, Scripting languages \\- Python
* Knowledge about Financial domain
* Prior knowledge of working in Agile model
* Aware of Cloud based technologies.


**WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT FROM MORGAN STANLEY:**
 At Morgan Stanley, we raise, manage and allocate capital for our clients \\- helping them reach their goals. We do it in a way that's differentiated \\- and we've done that for 90 years. Our values \\- putting clients first, doing the right thing, leading with exceptional ideas, committing to diversity and inclusion, and giving back \\- aren't just beliefs, they guide the decisions we make every day to do what's best for our clients, communities and more than 80,000 employees in 1,200 offices across 42 countries. At Morgan Stanley, you'll find an opportunity to work alongside the best and the brightest, in an environment where you are supported and empowered. Our teams are relentless collaborators and creative thinkers, fueled by their diverse backgrounds and experiences. We are proud to support our employees and their families at every point along their work\\-life journey, offering some of the most attractive and comprehensive employee benefits and perks in the industry. There's also ample opportunity to move about the business for those who show passion and grit in their work.
   

  

 To learn more about our offices across the globe, please copy and paste https://www.morganstanley.com/about\\-us/global\\-offices into your browser.
   

  

 Morgan Stanley is an equal opportunities employer. We work to provide a supportive and inclusive environment where all individuals can maximize their full potential. Our skilled and creative workforce is comprised of individuals drawn from a broad cross section of the global communities in which we operate and who reflect a variety of backgrounds, talents, perspectives, and experiences. Our strong commitment to a culture of inclusion is evident through our constant focus on recruiting, developing, and advancing individuals based on their skills and talents.

title: Python Developer - Director - Lead Software Engineering - Morgan Stanley
description:
We're seeking someone to join our CDRR Technology team as a Python Developer, in Tech Risk Gov \\& Controls (TRGC) to We are seeking a skilled and proactive Mid\\-Level Backend Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate should have a strong foundation in real\\-time applications, microservices, and be comfortable supporting production environments, including troubleshooting and resolving production issues promptly. You will work collaboratively in an Agile environment and contribute to building, deploying, and maintaining robust backend systems.
   

  

 In the Technology division, we leverage innovation to build the connections and capabilities that power our Firm, enabling our clients and colleagues to redefine markets and shape the future of our communities.
   

  

 This is Director position that develops and maintains software solutions that support business needs.
   

  

 Since 1935, Morgan Stanley is known as a global leader in financial services, always evolving and innovating to better serve our clients and our communities in more than 40 countries around the world.
   

  

**What you'll do in the role:**
**Application Development:**
 Design, develop, and maintain scalable and efficient Python\\-based applications and services. Write clean, maintainable, and well\\-documented code following industry best practices.
   

  

**Code Reviews and Mentorship:**
 Conduct code reviews to ensure code quality, performance, and adherence to standards. Mentor and guide junior developers, fostering technical growth within the team.
   

  

**Integration and Automation:**
 Develop and maintain APIs and integrations with third\\-party systems. Automate repetitive tasks and workflows to improve efficiency.
   

  

**Testing and Debugging:**
 Write unit tests, integration tests, and perform debugging to ensure high\\-quality deliverables. Identify and resolve performance bottlenecks and system issues.
   

  

**Collaboration and Communication:**
 Work closely with product managers, DevOps, and other teams to deliver end\\-to\\-end solutions. Communicate technical concepts effectively to both technical and non\\-technical stakeholders.
   

  

**Continuous Improvement:**
 Stay updated with the latest Python frameworks, libraries, and tools. Propose and implement improvements to existing systems and processes.
   

  

**Data Handling and Analysis:**
 Work with large datasets, ensuring efficient data processing and storage. Implement data pipelines and ETL processes as needed.
   

  

**What you'll bring to the role:**
* Experienced professional with 7\\+ years of development experience in Python
* 2\\-5 years of experience in Angular/ any other UI development skills. Strong networking background \\- IP, Firewalls, Proxy, Routing, Load Balancing, OSI Model, Packet trace and analysis, etc.)
* Good understanding of the protocols underpinning the web \\- TCP/IP, HTTP, SSL/TLS etc. (Ideal candidate would be able to intelligently dissect all 7 layers of the OSI stack) and troubleshoot.
* Hands on experience in understanding different data sets generated from various cybersecurity products/ services/ SIEM tools
* Understanding of data structures, data modelling and software architecture Experience in architecture, design, and implementation of data intensive applications for practical use\\-cases.
* Practical knowledge of deep learning implementation in at least one of the areas Cyber, NLP, Image Processing
* Strong quantitative and problem\\-solving skills
* Expertise in visualizing large datasets in an efficient manner
* Ability to work in fast paced and dynamic environment
* Good written and verbal communication skills
* Strong sense of ownership and accountability of deliverables


**WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT FROM MORGAN STANLEY:**
 At Morgan Stanley, we raise, manage and allocate capital for our clients \\- helping them reach their goals. We do it in a way that's differentiated \\- and we've done that for 90 years. Our values \\- putting clients first, doing the right thing, leading with exceptional ideas, committing to diversity and inclusion, and giving back \\- aren't just beliefs, they guide the decisions we make every day to do what's best for our clients, communities and more than 80,000 employees in 1,200 offices across 42 countries. At Morgan Stanley, you'll find an opportunity to work alongside the best and the brightest, in an environment where you are supported and empowered. Our teams are relentless collaborators and creative thinkers, fueled by their diverse backgrounds and experiences. We are proud to support our employees and their families at every point along their work\\-life journey, offering some of the most attractive and comprehensive employee benefits and perks in the industry. There's also ample opportunity to move about the business for those who show passion and grit in their work.
   

  

 To learn more about our offices across the globe, please copy and paste https://www.morganstanley.com/about\\-us/global\\-offices into your browser.
   

  

 Morgan Stanley is an equal opportunities employer. We work to provide a supportive and inclusive environment where all individuals can maximize their full potential. Our skilled and creative workforce is comprised of individuals drawn from a broad cross section of the global communities in which we operate and who reflect a variety of backgrounds, talents, perspectives, and experiences. Our strong commitment to a culture of inclusion is evident through our constant focus on recruiting, developing, and advancing individuals based on their skills and talents.

title: Azure SME
description:
* Strong understanding of Azure cloud architecture patterns, such as microservices, serverless, and containerization (Docker, Kubernetes).
* Proficiency in using Infrastructure as Code tools like Azure CloudFormation or Terraform.
* Experience with DevOps tools and practices, including CI/CD pipelines, Jenkins, Ansible, etc.
* Excellent problem\\-solving, communication, and leadership skills.
* Azure Administrator or higher is often required.
* Designed and deployed an Azure Policy for various resources


 This role involves a deep understanding of Azure services, migration strategies, and the ability to translate business needs into technical solutions. They act as trusted advisors, helping customers achieve agility, cost optimization, and business value through cloud adoption. Roles and Responsibilities:
   

  

* Develop and implement cloud migration strategies, assess existing environments, and define migration roadmaps.
* Design and document scalable, secure, and high\\-performing Azure architectures, including infrastructure as code using tools like AWS CloudFormation or Terraform.
* Performs engineering design evaluations for new environment builds
* Architect, implement and improve possible automations for cloud environments
* Implementation of industry standard security practices during implementation and maintain it throughout the lifecycle.
* Advise and engage with the customer executives on their cloud strategy roadmap, improvements, alignment by bringing in industry best practice/trends and work on further improvements with required business case analysis and required presentations.
* Creating business cases for transformation and modernization, including analysis of both total cost of ownership and potential cost and revenue impacts of the transformation
* Act as a trusted advisor to customers, providing guidance on security, cost optimization, performance, reliability, and operational efficiency.
* Collaborate with various stakeholders, including business leaders, technical teams, and partners, to ensure alignment with cloud transformation goals.
* Monitor and optimize cloud workloads for performance and cost efficiency, ensuring operational excellence.
* Implement and monitor security controls to ensure compliance with industry standards and regulations If you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you!
* Experience in regulated environments with a focus on data privacy and compliance.
* Knowledge of migration strategy, tools, network requirements, and integration pathways.
* Experience with cloud cost management and optimization.
* Understanding of change management and building new capabilities.

title: Senior Technical Lead – Node.js | Microservices | Azure Cloud
description:
**Company Description** 




 IByte Technology Solutions goes beyond traditional software development and consulting services. Alongside delivering innovative technological solutions, the company excels in talent acquisition and resource supply, ensuring clients access top\\-tier industry experts. Their focus on excellence highlights the importance of assembling the right team to drive exceptional project outcomes. By blending expertise in software development and talent sourcing, IByte Technology Solutions positions itself as a leader in delivering value\\-driven solutions.
 



**Role Description** 




 This is a full\\-time Principal Engineer – Platform \\& Distributed Systems role located on\\-site in WP, Kuala Lumpur. The role involves leading the design, development, and deployment of scalable distributed systems, coaching and mentoring junior engineers, and developing technical strategies to address complex engineering challenges. The Principal Engineer will collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to ensure the performance, reliability, and scalability of the platform. Additionally, the candidate will drive innovation and maintain best practices within the organization.
 



**Qualifications** 




 Strong experience with Node.js, NestJs framework, Typescript, Cloud technologies and
 



 Distributed Systems.
 



 • Strong experience in domain\\-driven design especially tactical patterns.
 



 • Deep understanding of event\\-driven architectures with at least one of the following patterns:
 



 SAGA, event sourcing, CQRS, Kafka streaming.
 



 • Significant experience in enhancing and managing DevOps capabilities and CI/CD pipelines, with 
 



 a focus on Azure Cloud, GitHub, Docker, and Kubernetes, is required. 
 



 • Experience in designing and building databases that support microservices with technologies
 



 such as SQL Server, Mongo DB as well as implementing caching with tools such as Redis.
 



 • Experience in Test Driven Development.
 


* • Familiar with highly scalable and distributed systems
